pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linguistic Matching and Accommodation // Measure similarity between texts. Offers a variety of processing tools and similarity metrics to facilitate flexible representation of texts and matching. Implements forms of Language Style Matching (Ireland Pennebaker, 2010) doi:10.1037/a0020386 and Latent Semantic Analysis (Landauer Dumais, 1997) doi:10.1037/0033-295X.104.2.211.
